Articles.Content:
Hey uh.. guys, astronauts, astrophysicists, Kerbals? Anyways!

I should introduce myself before going deeper in the forums. My real name is Naji (Arabian but not proud to be one), from Jordan (not proud neither, leaving soon). I'm 17 years old, and I'm a space addict. I tend to say hello to the planets everyday (you know, wave at them in the sky) but it's winter now so :/

I love this game and it's developers, love the forums and it's people and just love everything about KSP. I'm a daily player but even still I'm pretty bad at the game. I played Career mode for a long while until the missions wanted bases on Duna and Eve while I still didn't even get to Eeloo or Moho or some of Jool's moons. I love exploring more than setting up bases and the complicated stuff, so I stopped playing Career and started my own space program (BSA - Beyond Space Agency) currently in Sandbox mode. Doing NASA-style flybys and landers (cuz, duh, who doesn't like NASA).

Anyways, that's about it! I'm a guitarist as well (acoustic) and a League of Legends player (I doubt anyone here plays it). My hobby? Flying with Jeb! (don't be sad Val)

Take care everyone!

Martian Music.

Edited December 15, 2015 by Martian Music
Because I can. Huehue.

Welcome to the forum Martian Music,  proud or not you are among friends here, and there's no reason to justify anything to anyone, so just be yourself!

I also enjoy spotting things in the sky and wondering amazing things, or simply giving a wave like you.  You'll fit in well here, good luck!

SM

Hello Martian Music, and welcome to the forum!

There are those who love all sorts of space agencies to be found here.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Hello, Martian Music!

I must say, for a non-native English speaker, your writing is exceptional.

It's good to have you here, hope you stay a while!

Thanks everyone! I sure will be myself

Well as for my writing, I spent my entire life chatting with English-speaking people so I really got used to it ;p
